metadata.title: CVE-2019-20162 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC version 0.8.0 and0.9.0-development-20191109. There is heap-based buffer overflow in thefunction gf_isom_box_parse_ex() in isomedia/box_funcs.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
